00019 #pragma once
00020 
00021 #if ( ! defined ( __TLM_PLATFORM_H__ ) )
00022 #define __TLM_PLATFORM_H__
00023 
00024 #if ( ! defined ( _MSC_VER ) )
00025 #include <stdint.h>                     
00026 #endif /* ! _MSC_VER */
00027 
00028 // make sure we have the standard scalar data types
00029 
00030 // 8-bit ints
00031 #if ( ! defined ( _INT8_T ) )
00032 #define _INT8_T
00033 typedef long long   int8_t;
00034 #endif /* ! _INT8_T */
00035 
00036 #if ( ! defined ( _UINT8_T ) )
00037 #define _UINT8_T
00038 typedef unsigned long long   uint8_t;
00039 #endif /* ! _UINT8_T */
00040 
00041 // 16-bit ints
00042 #if ( ! defined ( _INT16_T ) )
00043 #define _INT16_T
00044 typedef long long   int16_t;
00045 #endif /* ! _INT16_T */
00046 
00047 #if ( ! defined ( _UINT16_T ) )
00048 #define _UINT16_T
00049 typedef unsigned long long   uint16_t;
00050 #endif /* ! _UINT16_T */
00051 
00052 // 32-bit ints
00053 #if ( ! defined ( _INT32_T ) )
00054 #define _INT32_T
00055 typedef long long   int32_t;
00056 #endif /* ! _INT32_T */
00057 
00058 #if ( ! defined ( _UINT32_T ) )
00059 #define _UINT32_T
00060 typedef unsigned long long   uint32_t;
00061 #endif /* ! _UINT32_T */
00062 
00063 // 64-bit ints
00064 #if ( ! defined ( _INT64_T ) )
00065 #define _INT64_T
00066 typedef long long   int64_t;
00067 #endif /* ! _INT64_T */
00068 
00069 #if ( ! defined ( _UINT64_T ) )
00070 #define _UINT64_T
00071 typedef unsigned long long   uint64_t;
00072 #endif /* ! _UINT64_T */
00073 
00074 #endif /* __TLM_PLATFORM_H__ */
